__e: Your brother won't even talk to me, he might as well be dead.
I tried to do this before, you may recall, and you refused to talk to me.
But I don't get it. She refused to meet me and...
Or if he didn't make it, that got him killed?
I told her, I had refused to take him
Okay, I mean, from my point of view, it's always been that you did something really... really wrong to me and then you just refused... that--
But I don't get it. She refused to meet me and...
You even refused to testify what you learned, even though it would have saved your life.
He kills your friends because you don't go on a date with him?
That's a tough break. Especially since you all just got turned down for a job.
You said "no" to me years ago when I offered you a job.
I know that, Vinnie. But I didn't take the job.
That's why you turned down the judgeship.
They said you haven't turned the job down yet.
That's what God also wants, to give you the love you've never had, the love your mother refused you, the support your father didn't give you.
There's good reason, it would seem, that you were the only one to whom they refused a pardon.
Is this all because I rejected your little mom-dinner idea, or what?
I refused, and when she asked me why, I told her it was because I am a vampire.
Denied, and that's not my last name.
I fly to LA, I ask you to marry me, you said no, so I moved on.
And yet you denied me the chance to even give life.
She should be here with us, but she's turned death down.
And when you opted out of college, I never thought it was because you were the one who had to stay home and do the hard work.
That means someone else was not.
She's never kept a man out of anywhere in her entire life.
I MEAN, YOU'RE GREAT WHEN IT COMES TO FIRING THE SITTER,
